checks.title: Ensure mounting of cramfs filesystems is disabled
checks.description: The cramfs filesystem type is a compressed read-only Linux filesystem. It is used in embedded systems.

checks.title: Ensure ufw is installed and enabled
checks.description: UFW provides a simple interface for managing iptables firewall rules.

checks.title: Ensure auditd is installed
checks.description: auditd is responsible for writing audit records to the disk.

checks.title: Ensure password expiration is 365 days or less
checks.description: Password expiration ensures that passwords are changed periodically.

checks.title: Ensure permissions on /etc/shadow are configured
checks.description: The /etc/shadow file contains user password hashes.
